title: Did NHS Warn Against Gwyneth Paltrow’s COVID-19 Advice?
subtitle: Paltrow recommended "intuitive fasting" and goop-sponsored products to recover from lingering symptoms. We recommend consulting a doctor instead.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: A leader of the National Health Service (NHS) warned against the advice of Gwyneth Paltrow for treating lingering effects of COVID-19.
